attributes.action: Abolish the DDA The Dangerous Dog Act 1991and BSL
attributes.additional_details: The Dangerous Dog Act and BSL are dated unfair and unjust remove it in favor of all dogs no matter what the breed to be licenced, microchipped and owners hold third-party insurance
attributes.background: Abolish the out Dated DDA Remove the Dangerous Dog act of 1991 and BSL in favour for all dogs no matter what breed to be licenced and owners to hold third party insurance

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions:

Introduce licences, mandatory training and annual vet visits to own a dog: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643739

Bring back a Dog Licence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643650

Introduce compulsory Third Party insurance to cover dogs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640196
